item.title: NeueHouse Clubs in Hollywood, Venice Beach and Manhattan Will Shut Down as of Friday
item.description: The NeueHouse chain of members only clubs catering to those working in creative industries will shut down on Friday. The company confirmed the decision with a lengthy message posted on its website. Ne

item.title: NeueHouse, Members Club That Catered to Hollywood Creatives, Says It Will Shut Down
item.description: The members club and co-working space, with locations in Los Angeles and New York, said that its last day of operations will be Friday, after which it will file for bankruptcy.
